translations: n.海面变化；[海洋] 海面升降

phrs.translation: 海面升降, 海准变动

sentences.sentence: During the Upper Paleozoic in Huabei there were 3 main times of sea level eustacy which caused different deposits in research area.
sentences.translation: 华北晚古生代经历了3次大的海平面升降旋回，不同海侵事件在研究区内留下了不同的沉积纪录。

sentences.sentence: Three main factors including basement subsidence, sediment supply and eustacy affect the accommodation space, structure dominated in the evolution of both the accommodation and sedimentary facies.
sentences.translation: 基底沉降、沉积物供给和湖平面升降是影响断陷湖盆可容空间发育的主要因素，其中构造活动的影响最为明显。
